channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Shortcut Macros
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Shortcut Macros

item.title: CVE-2022-1956|2024-08-03T00:24:43.993Z -- unknown -- shortcut%20macros
item.description: The Shortcut Macros WordPress plugin through 1.3 does not have authorisation and CSRF checks in place when updating its settings, which could allow any authenticated users, such as subscriber, to update them.
